param.name: ppIWriter
param.para: Pointer that receives a pointer to a metadata writer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the metadata header for the metadata writer.

param.name: guidContainerFormat
param.para: The format container GUID to obtain the header for.

param.name: cbSize
param.para: The size of the pHeader buffer.

param.name: pcbActual
param.para: The actual size of the header.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide basic information about the registered metadata writer.
